participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: caring and resilient, with a love for family and crafting.
participant_1.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i am retired and living the great life. i do not have a smartphone.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: active and health-conscious, enjoys fitness and staying in shape.
participant_2.background: i go to the gym regularly. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. eating is something i do when i'm bored. i have short hair.
